item.description:
Buon giorno amici!

If you are looking for something to do this weekend - How about Italian Opera!



The Barber of Seville
Sat. Oct 30, 2010 at 8:00pm

Hoffman Auditorium (St. Joseph's College)
1678 Asylum Ave.
West Hartford, CT 06117

Ages: All ages

Price: $ 40.00
Connecticut Concert Opera presents

Il Barbiere di Siviglia ("The Barber of Seville")

Opera in 2 acts by Gioachino Rossini. Of this opera, Giuseppi Verdi wrote: "For abundance of true musical ideas, for comic verve and for truth of declamation, Il Barbiere is the most beautiful comic opera in existence".

This performance features Matthew Worth as Figaro, and Sarah Callinan as Rosina, in a semi staged production, with an orchestra comprised of musicians from the Hartford Symphony, all conducted by Connecticut Concert Opera's Artistic Director and Conductor, Doris Lang Kosloff.
item.name: Il Barbiere di Siviglia (The Barber of Seville) - Sat.,Oct 30
